- [Daftar Ruang Kerja](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/admin-api/workspaces/list-workspaces.md)
- [Perbarui Workspace](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/admin-api/workspaces/update-workspace.md)
- [Ikhtisar Admin API](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/administration-api.md)
- [Melacak Biaya dan Penggunaan](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/agent-sdk/cost-tracking.md): Memahami dan melacak penggunaan token untuk penagihan dalam Claude Agent SDK
- [Alat Kustom](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/agent-sdk/custom-tools.md): Bangun dan integrasikan alat kustom untuk memperluas fungsionalitas Claude Agent SDK
- [Hosting Agent SDK](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/agent-sdk/hosting.md): Deploy dan host Claude Agent SDK di lingkungan produksi
- [MCP dalam SDK](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/agent-sdk/mcp.md): Perluas Claude Code dengan alat kustom menggunakan server Model Context Protocol
- [Memodifikasi system prompt](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/agent-sdk/modifying-system-prompts.md): Pelajari cara menyesuaikan perilaku Claude dengan memodifikasi system prompt menggunakan tiga pendekatan - output styles, systemPrompt dengan append, dan custom system prompt.
- [Ikhtisar Agent SDK](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/agent-sdk/overview.md): Bangun agen AI kustom dengan Claude Agent SDK
- [Menangani Izin](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/agent-sdk/permissions.md): Kontrol penggunaan alat dan izin dalam Claude Agent SDK
- [Referensi Agent SDK - Python](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/agent-sdk/python.md): Referensi API lengkap untuk Python Agent SDK, termasuk semua fungsi, tipe, dan kelas.
- [Manajemen Sesi](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/agent-sdk/sessions.md): Memahami bagaimana Claude Agent SDK menangani sesi dan pemulihan sesi
- [Perintah Slash dalam SDK](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/agent-sdk/slash-commands.md): Pelajari cara menggunakan perintah slash untuk mengontrol sesi Claude Code melalui SDK
- [Input Streaming](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/agent-sdk/streaming-vs-single-mode.md): Memahami dua mode input untuk Claude Agent SDK dan kapan menggunakan masing-masing
- [Subagen dalam SDK](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/agent-sdk/subagents.md): Bekerja dengan subagen dalam Claude Agent SDK
- [Daftar Todo](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/agent-sdk/todo-tracking.md): Lacak dan tampilkan todo menggunakan Claude Agent SDK untuk manajemen tugas yang terorganisir
- [Referensi Agent SDK - TypeScript](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/agent-sdk/typescript.md): Referensi API lengkap untuk TypeScript Agent SDK, termasuk semua fungsi, tipe, dan interface.
- [Header beta](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/beta-headers.md): Dokumentasi untuk menggunakan header beta dengan API Claude
- [Batalkan Batch Pesan](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/canceling-message-batches.md): Batches may be canceled any time before processing ends. Once cancellation is initiated, the batch enters a `canceling` state, at which time the system may complete any in-progress, non-interruptible requests before finalizing cancellation.

The number of canceled requests is specified in `request_counts`. To determine which requests were canceled, check the individual results within the batch. Note that cancellation may not result in any canceled requests if they were non-interruptible.

Learn more about the Message Batches API in our [user guide](/en/docs/build-with-claude/batch-processing)
- [Claude Code Analytics API](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/claude-code-analytics-api.md): Akses analitik penggunaan Claude Code organisasi Anda secara terprogram dan metrik produktivitas dengan Claude Code Analytics Admin API.
- [Amazon Bedrock API](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/claude-on-amazon-bedrock.md): Model Claude dari Anthropic sekarang tersedia secara umum melalui Amazon Bedrock.
- [Vertex AI API](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/claude-on-vertex-ai.md): Model Claude dari Anthropic sekarang tersedia secara umum melalui [Vertex AI](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai).
- [SDK Klien](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/client-sdks.md): Kami menyediakan pustaka klien dalam sejumlah bahasa populer yang memudahkan bekerja dengan API Claude.
- [Buat Batch Pesan](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/creating-message-batches.md): Send a batch of Message creation requests.

The Message Batches API can be used to process multiple Messages API requests at once. Once a Message Batch is created, it begins processing immediately. Batches can take up to 24 hours to complete.

Learn more about the Message Batches API in our [user guide](/en/docs/build-with-claude/batch-processing)
- [Hapus Batch Pesan](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/deleting-message-batches.md): Delete a Message Batch.

Message Batches can only be deleted once they've finished processing. If you'd like to delete an in-progress batch, you must first cancel it.

Learn more about the Message Batches API in our [user guide](/en/docs/build-with-claude/batch-processing)
- [Kesalahan](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/errors.md)
- [Unduh File](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/files-content.md): Unduh konten file yang dihasilkan Claude
- [Buat File](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/files-create.md): Unggah file
- [Hapus File](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/files-delete.md): Membuat file tidak dapat diakses melalui API
- [Daftar File](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/files-list.md): Daftar file dalam workspace
- [Dapatkan Metadata File](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/files-metadata.md)
- [Mendapatkan bantuan](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/getting-help.md): Kami telah berusaha memberikan jawaban untuk pertanyaan yang paling umum dalam dokumentasi ini. Namun, jika Anda memerlukan dukungan teknis lebih lanjut dalam menggunakan Claude, Claude API, atau produk kami lainnya, Anda dapat menghubungi tim dukungan kami di [support.claude.com](https://support.claude.com).
- [Menangani alasan berhenti](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/handling-stop-reasons.md): Pelajari cara menangani berbagai nilai stop_reason dalam respons API Messages Claude untuk membangun aplikasi yang lebih robust.
- [Alamat IP](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/ip-addresses.md): Layanan Anthropic menggunakan alamat IP tetap untuk koneksi masuk dan keluar. Anda dapat menggunakan alamat-alamat ini untuk mengonfigurasi aturan firewall Anda untuk akses aman ke Claude API dan Console. Alamat-alamat ini tidak akan berubah tanpa pemberitahuan.
- [Daftar Batch Pesan](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/listing-message-batches.md): List all Message Batches within a Workspace. Most recently created batches are returned first.

Learn more about the Message Batches API in our [user guide](/en/docs/build-with-claude/batch-processing)
- [Pesan](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/messages.md): Send a structured list of input messages with text and/or image content, and the model will generate the next message in the conversation.

The Messages API can be used for either single queries or stateless multi-turn conversations.

Learn more about the Messages API in our [user guide](/en/docs/initial-setup)
- [Contoh Message Batches](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/messages-batch-examples.md): Contoh penggunaan untuk Message Batches API
- [Hitung Token Pesan](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/messages-count-tokens.md): Count the number of tokens in a Message.

The Token Count API can be used to count the number of tokens in a Message, including tools, images, and documents, without creating it.

Learn more about token counting in our [user guide](/en/docs/build-with-claude/token-counting)
- [Contoh Messages](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/messages-examples.md): Contoh permintaan dan respons untuk Messages API
- [Migrasi dari Text Completions](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/migrating-from-text-completions-to-messages.md): Migrasi dari Text Completions ke Messages
- [Dapatkan Model](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/models.md): Get a specific model.

The Models API response can be used to determine information about a specific model or resolve a model alias to a model ID.
- [Daftar Model](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/models-list.md): List available models.

The Models API response can be used to determine which models are available for use in the API. More recently released models are listed first.
- [Kompatibilitas SDK OpenAI](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/openai-sdk.md): Anthropic menyediakan lapisan kompatibilitas yang memungkinkan Anda menggunakan SDK OpenAI untuk menguji Claude API. Dengan beberapa perubahan kode, Anda dapat dengan cepat mengevaluasi kemampuan model Anthropic.
- [Gambaran Umum](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/overview.md): Gambaran umum tentang cara mengakses dan menggunakan API Claude
- [Menghasilkan prompt](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/prompt-tools-generate.md): Menghasilkan prompt yang ditulis dengan baik
- [Meningkatkan prompt](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/prompt-tools-improve.md): Membuat prompt baru yang lebih baik dengan panduan umpan balik
- [Membuat template prompt](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/prompt-tools-templatize.md): Membuat template prompt dengan mengidentifikasi dan mengekstrak variabel
- [Batas tarif](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/rate-limits.md): Untuk mengurangi penyalahgunaan dan mengelola kapasitas pada API kami, kami telah menerapkan batas pada seberapa banyak organisasi dapat menggunakan Claude API.
- [Ambil Hasil Batch Pesan](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/retrieving-message-batch-results.md): Streams the results of a Message Batch as a `.jsonl` file.

Each line in the file is a JSON object containing the result of a single request in the Message Batch. Results are not guaranteed to be in the same order as requests. Use the `custom_id` field to match results to requests.

Learn more about the Message Batches API in our [user guide](/en/docs/build-with-claude/batch-processing)
- [Mengambil Batch Pesan](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/retrieving-message-batches.md): This endpoint is idempotent and can be used to poll for Message Batch completion. To access the results of a Message Batch, make a request to the `results_url` field in the response.

Learn more about the Message Batches API in our [user guide](/en/docs/build-with-claude/batch-processing)
- [Tingkatan layanan](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/service-tiers.md): Tingkatan layanan yang berbeda memungkinkan Anda menyeimbangkan ketersediaan, performa, dan biaya yang dapat diprediksi berdasarkan kebutuhan aplikasi Anda.
- [Menggunakan Agent Skills dengan API](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/skills-guide.md): Pelajari cara menggunakan Agent Skills untuk memperluas kemampuan Claude melalui API.
- [Wilayah yang didukung](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/supported-regions.md): Berikut adalah negara, wilayah, dan teritorial yang saat ini dapat kami dukung aksesnya:
- [API Penggunaan dan Biaya](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/usage-cost-api.md): Akses data penggunaan dan biaya API organisasi Anda secara terprogram dengan API Admin Penggunaan & Biaya.
- [Versi](https://docs.claude.com/id/api/versioning.md): Saat membuat permintaan API, Anda harus mengirim header permintaan `anthropic-version`. Misalnya, `anthropic-version: 2023-06-01`. Jika Anda menggunakan [SDK klien](/id/api/client-sdks) kami, ini ditangani untuk Anda secara otomatis.
- [Glosarium](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/about-claude/glossary.md): Konsep-konsep ini tidak unik untuk model bahasa Anthropic, tetapi kami menyajikan ringkasan singkat tentang istilah-istilah kunci di bawah ini.
- [Penghentian model](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/about-claude/model-deprecations.md)
- [Memilih model yang tepat](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/about-claude/models/choosing-a-model.md): Memilih model Claude yang optimal untuk aplikasi Anda melibatkan keseimbangan tiga pertimbangan utama: kemampuan, kecepatan, dan biaya. Panduan ini membantu Anda membuat keputusan yang tepat berdasarkan kebutuhan spesifik Anda.
- [Migrasi ke Claude 4.5](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/about-claude/models/migrating-to-claude-4.md): Panduan migrasi dari Claude Sonnet 3.7 ke Claude Sonnet 4.5 dan dari Claude Haiku 3.5 ke Claude Haiku 4.5 dengan petunjuk langkah demi langkah dan perubahan yang merusak.
- [Ikhtisar model](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/about-claude/models/overview.md): Claude adalah keluarga model bahasa besar canggih yang dikembangkan oleh Anthropic. Panduan ini memperkenalkan model kami dan membandingkan kinerja mereka.
- [Apa yang baru di Claude 4.5](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/about-claude/models/whats-new-claude-4-5.md)
- [Harga](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/about-claude/pricing.md): Pelajari tentang struktur harga Anthropic untuk model dan fitur
- [Moderasi konten](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/about-claude/use-case-guides/content-moderation.md): Moderasi konten adalah aspek penting dalam mempertahankan lingkungan yang aman, penuh hormat, dan produktif dalam aplikasi digital. Dalam panduan ini, kami akan membahas bagaimana Claude dapat digunakan untuk memoderasi konten dalam aplikasi digital Anda.
- [Agen dukungan pelanggan](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/about-claude/use-case-guides/customer-support-chat.md): Panduan ini menjelaskan cara memanfaatkan kemampuan percakapan canggih Claude untuk menangani pertanyaan pelanggan secara real-time, menyediakan dukungan 24/7, mengurangi waktu tunggu, dan mengelola volume dukungan tinggi dengan respons yang akurat dan interaksi yang positif.
- [Ringkasan hukum](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/about-claude/use-case-guides/legal-summarization.md): Panduan ini menjelaskan cara memanfaatkan kemampuan pemrosesan bahasa alami canggih Claude untuk meringkas dokumen hukum secara efisien, mengekstrak informasi kunci dan mempercepat penelitian hukum. Dengan Claude, Anda dapat menyederhanakan peninjauan kontrak, persiapan litigasi, dan pekerjaan regulasi, menghemat waktu dan memastikan akurasi dalam proses hukum Anda.
- [Panduan untuk kasus penggunaan umum](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/about-claude/use-case-guides/overview.md)
- [Perutean tiket](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/about-claude/use-case-guides/ticket-routing.md): Panduan ini menjelaskan cara memanfaatkan kemampuan pemahaman bahasa alami canggih Claude untuk mengklasifikasikan tiket dukungan pelanggan secara besar-besaran berdasarkan niat pelanggan, urgensi, prioritas, profil pelanggan, dan lainnya.
- [Add-on Google Sheets](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/agents-and-tools/claude-for-sheets.md): [Ekstensi Claude for Sheets](https://workspace.google.com/marketplace/app/claude%5Ffor%5Fsheets/909417792257) mengintegrasikan Claude ke dalam Google Sheets, memungkinkan Anda menjalankan interaksi dengan Claude langsung di dalam sel.
- [Konektor MCP](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/agents-and-tools/mcp-connector.md): Fitur konektor Model Context Protocol (MCP) Claude memungkinkan Anda terhubung ke server MCP jarak jauh langsung dari Messages API tanpa klien MCP terpisah.
- [Server MCP jarak jauh](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/agents-and-tools/remote-mcp-servers.md): Server MCP jarak jauh yang dapat dihubungkan oleh pengembang melalui API konektor MCP Anthropic.
- [Alat bash](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/bash-tool.md): Alat bash memungkinkan Claude menjalankan perintah shell dalam sesi bash yang persisten, memungkinkan operasi sistem, eksekusi skrip, dan otomatisasi command-line.
- [Tool eksekusi kode](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/code-execution-tool.md)
- [Tool penggunaan komputer](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/computer-use-tool.md): Claude dapat berinteraksi dengan lingkungan komputer melalui tool penggunaan komputer, yang menyediakan kemampuan screenshot dan kontrol mouse/keyboard untuk interaksi desktop otonom.
- [Streaming tool berbutir halus](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/fine-grained-tool-streaming.md): Tool use sekarang mendukung streaming berbutir halus untuk nilai parameter, memungkinkan developer untuk streaming parameter tool use tanpa buffering/validasi JSON.
- [Cara mengimplementasikan penggunaan tool](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/implement-tool-use.md): Pelajari cara mengimplementasikan penggunaan tool dengan Claude, termasuk memilih model yang tepat, menentukan tool klien, mengontrol output Claude, dan menangani blok konten tool use dan tool result.
- [Alat memori](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/memory-tool.md): Alat memori memungkinkan Claude untuk menyimpan dan mengambil informasi lintas percakapan melalui direktori file memori.
- [Penggunaan tool dengan Claude](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/overview.md)
- [Tool editor teks](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/text-editor-tool.md): Claude dapat menggunakan tool editor teks yang didefinisikan oleh Anthropic untuk melihat dan memodifikasi file teks, membantu Anda debug, memperbaiki, dan meningkatkan kode atau dokumen teks lainnya.
- [Penggunaan tool yang efisien token](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/token-efficient-tool-use.md)
- [Alat web fetch](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/web-fetch-tool.md): Alat web fetch memungkinkan Claude untuk mengambil konten lengkap dari halaman web dan dokumen PDF yang ditentukan.
- [Alat pencarian web](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/web-search-tool.md): Alat pencarian web memberikan Claude akses langsung ke konten web real-time, memungkinkannya menjawab pertanyaan dengan informasi terkini melampaui batas pengetahuannya.
- [Pemrosesan batch](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/batch-processing.md)
- [Kutipan](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/citations.md): Claude mampu memberikan kutipan terperinci saat menjawab pertanyaan tentang dokumen, membantu Anda melacak dan memverifikasi sumber informasi dalam respons.
- [Pengeditan konteks](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/context-editing.md): Kelola konteks percakapan secara otomatis saat berkembang dengan pengeditan konteks.
- [Jendela konteks](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/context-windows.md): Memahami jendela konteks dalam model bahasa Claude dan cara kerjanya dengan fitur-fitur seperti extended thinking dan penggunaan alat.
- [Embeddings](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/embeddings.md): Embeddings teks adalah representasi numerik dari teks yang memungkinkan pengukuran kesamaan semantik. Panduan ini memperkenalkan embeddings, aplikasinya, dan cara menggunakan model embedding untuk tugas seperti pencarian, rekomendasi, dan deteksi anomali.
- [Membangun dengan extended thinking](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/extended-thinking.md)
- [Files API](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/files.md): API Files memungkinkan Anda mengunggah dan mengelola file untuk digunakan dengan Claude API tanpa perlu mengunggah ulang konten pada setiap permintaan.
- [Dukungan multibahasa](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/multilingual-support.md): Claude unggul dalam tugas-tugas lintas berbagai bahasa, mempertahankan performa lintas bahasa yang kuat relatif terhadap bahasa Inggris.
- [Ikhtisar fitur](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/overview.md): Jelajahi fitur-fitur canggih dan kemampuan Claude.
- [Dukungan PDF](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/pdf-support.md): Proses PDF dengan Claude. Ekstrak teks, analisis grafik, dan pahami konten visual dari dokumen Anda.
- [Prompt caching](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/prompt-caching.md): Fitur caching prompt yang mengoptimalkan penggunaan API dengan memungkinkan melanjutkan dari prefiks tertentu dalam prompt Anda.
- [Bersikaplah jelas, langsung, dan terperinci](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/prompt-engineering/be-clear-and-direct.md)
- [Biarkan Claude berpikir (chain of thought prompting) untuk meningkatkan performa](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/prompt-engineering/chain-of-thought.md)
- [Rangkai prompt kompleks untuk performa yang lebih kuat](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/prompt-engineering/chain-prompts.md): Pelajari cara memecah tugas kompleks menjadi subtask yang dapat dikelola menggunakan prompt chaining untuk meningkatkan akurasi dan kejelasan dengan Claude.
- [Praktik terbaik rekayasa prompt Claude 4](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/prompt-engineering/claude-4-best-practices.md): Panduan teknik rekayasa prompt khusus untuk model Claude 4 guna mencapai hasil optimal dalam aplikasi Anda.
- [Tips pemikiran diperpanjang](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/prompt-engineering/extended-thinking-tips.md): Panduan lanjutan untuk memaksimalkan fitur pemikiran diperpanjang Claude dengan strategi dan teknik yang efektif.
- [Tips prompting untuk konteks panjang](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/prompt-engineering/long-context-tips.md)
- [Gunakan contoh (multishot prompting) untuk memandu perilaku Claude](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/prompt-engineering/multishot-prompting.md)
- [Ikhtisar rekayasa prompt](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/prompt-engineering/overview.md): Panduan komprehensif untuk rekayasa prompt dengan Claude, mencakup teknik dari dasar hingga lanjutan untuk mengoptimalkan kinerja model AI.
- [Prefill respons Claude untuk kontrol output yang lebih baik](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/prompt-engineering/prefill-claudes-response.md)
- [Secara otomatis menghasilkan template prompt draf pertama](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/prompt-engineering/prompt-generator.md)
- [Gunakan perbaikan prompt kami untuk mengoptimalkan prompt Anda](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/prompt-engineering/prompt-improver.md): Gunakan perbaikan prompt kami untuk mengoptimalkan prompt Anda
- [Gunakan template prompt dan variabel](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/prompt-engineering/prompt-templates-and-variables.md)
- [Memberikan Claude sebuah peran dengan prompt sistem](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/prompt-engineering/system-prompts.md)
- [Gunakan tag XML untuk menyusun prompt Anda](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/prompt-engineering/use-xml-tags.md)
- [Hasil pencarian](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/search-results.md): Aktifkan kutipan alami untuk aplikasi RAG dengan menyediakan hasil pencarian dengan atribusi sumber
- [Streaming Messages](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/streaming.md): Pelajari cara menggunakan streaming untuk menerima respons secara bertahap menggunakan server-sent events (SSE).
- [Penghitungan token](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/token-counting.md)
- [Vision](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/build-with-claude/vision.md): Keluarga model Claude 3 dan 4 hadir dengan kemampuan vision baru yang memungkinkan Claude memahami dan menganalisis gambar, membuka kemungkinan menarik untuk interaksi multimodal.
- [Claude Code di Amazon Bedrock](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/amazon-bedrock.md): Pelajari tentang mengonfigurasi Claude Code melalui Amazon Bedrock, termasuk pengaturan, konfigurasi IAM, dan pemecahan masalah.
- [Analitik](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/analytics.md): Lihat wawasan penggunaan terperinci dan metrik produktivitas untuk deployment Claude Code organisasi Anda.
- [Checkpointing](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/checkpointing.md): Secara otomatis melacak dan memutar balik edit Claude untuk dengan cepat memulihkan dari perubahan yang tidak diinginkan.
- [Referensi CLI](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/cli-reference.md): Referensi lengkap untuk antarmuka baris perintah Claude Code, termasuk perintah dan flag.
- [Alur kerja umum](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/common-workflows.md): Pelajari tentang alur kerja umum dengan Claude Code.
- [Kelola biaya secara efektif](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/costs.md): Pelajari cara melacak dan mengoptimalkan penggunaan token dan biaya saat menggunakan Claude Code.
- [Penggunaan data](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/data-usage.md): Pelajari tentang kebijakan penggunaan data Anthropic untuk Claude
- [Kontainer pengembangan](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/devcontainer.md): Pelajari tentang kontainer pengembangan Claude Code untuk tim yang membutuhkan lingkungan yang konsisten dan aman.
- [Claude Code GitHub Actions](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/github-actions.md): Pelajari tentang mengintegrasikan Claude Code ke dalam alur kerja pengembangan Anda dengan Claude Code GitHub Actions
- [Claude Code GitLab CI/CD](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/gitlab-ci-cd.md): Pelajari tentang mengintegrasikan Claude Code ke dalam alur kerja pengembangan Anda dengan GitLab CI/CD
- [Claude Code di Google Vertex AI](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/google-vertex-ai.md): Pelajari tentang mengonfigurasi Claude Code melalui Google Vertex AI, termasuk pengaturan, konfigurasi IAM, dan pemecahan masalah.
- [Mode headless](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/headless.md): Jalankan Claude Code secara programatis tanpa UI interaktif
- [Referensi hooks](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/hooks.md): Halaman ini menyediakan dokumentasi referensi untuk mengimplementasikan hooks di Claude Code.
- [Memulai dengan Claude Code hooks](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/hooks-guide.md): Pelajari cara menyesuaikan dan memperluas perilaku Claude Code dengan mendaftarkan perintah shell
- [Manajemen Identitas dan Akses](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/iam.md): Pelajari cara mengonfigurasi autentikasi pengguna, otorisasi, dan kontrol akses untuk Claude Code di organisasi Anda.
- [Mode interaktif](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/interactive-mode.md): Referensi lengkap untuk pintasan keyboard, mode input, dan fitur interaktif dalam sesi Claude Code.
- [JetBrains IDEs](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/jetbrains.md): Gunakan Claude Code dengan JetBrains IDEs termasuk IntelliJ, PyCharm, WebStorm, dan lainnya
- [Hukum dan kepatuhan](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/legal-and-compliance.md): Perjanjian hukum, sertifikasi kepatuhan, dan informasi keamanan untuk Claude Code.
- [Konfigurasi gateway LLM](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/llm-gateway.md): Pelajari cara mengonfigurasi Claude Code dengan solusi gateway LLM, termasuk pengaturan LiteLLM, metode autentikasi, dan fitur enterprise seperti pelacakan penggunaan dan manajemen anggaran.
- [Menghubungkan Claude Code ke alat melalui MCP](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/mcp.md): Pelajari cara menghubungkan Claude Code ke alat Anda dengan Model Context Protocol.
- [Kelola memori Claude](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/memory.md): Pelajari cara mengelola memori Claude Code di berbagai sesi dengan lokasi memori yang berbeda dan praktik terbaik.
- [Konfigurasi model](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/model-config.md): Pelajari tentang konfigurasi model Claude Code, termasuk alias model seperti `opusplan`
- [Pemantauan](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/monitoring-usage.md): Pelajari cara mengaktifkan dan mengonfigurasi OpenTelemetry untuk Claude Code.
- [Konfigurasi jaringan enterprise](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/network-config.md): Konfigurasikan Claude Code untuk lingkungan enterprise dengan server proxy, Certificate Authority (CA) kustom, dan autentikasi mutual Transport Layer Security (mTLS).
- [Gaya output](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/output-styles.md): Adaptasi Claude Code untuk penggunaan di luar rekayasa perangkat lunak
- [Ikhtisar Claude Code](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/overview.md): Pelajari tentang Claude Code, alat coding agentic dari Anthropic yang berada di terminal Anda dan membantu Anda mengubah ide menjadi kode lebih cepat dari sebelumnya.
- [Marketplace plugin](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/plugin-marketplaces.md): Buat dan kelola marketplace plugin untuk mendistribusikan ekstensi Claude Code di seluruh tim dan komunitas.
- [Plugin](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/plugins.md): Perluas Claude Code dengan perintah kustom, agen, hook, dan server MCP melalui sistem plugin.
- [Referensi plugin](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/plugins-reference.md): Referensi teknis lengkap untuk sistem plugin Claude Code, termasuk skema, perintah CLI, dan spesifikasi komponen.
- [Panduan Cepat](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/quickstart.md): Selamat datang di Claude Code!
- [Migrasi ke Claude Agent SDK](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/sdk/migration-guide.md): Panduan untuk migrasi Claude Code TypeScript dan Python SDK ke Claude Agent SDK
- [Keamanan](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/security.md): Pelajari tentang perlindungan keamanan Claude Code dan praktik terbaik untuk penggunaan yang aman.
- [Pengaturan Claude Code](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/settings.md): Konfigurasikan Claude Code dengan pengaturan global dan tingkat proyek, serta variabel lingkungan.
- [Siapkan Claude Code](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/setup.md): Instal, autentikasi, dan mulai menggunakan Claude Code pada mesin pengembangan Anda.
- [Agent Skills](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/skills.md): Buat, kelola, dan bagikan Skills untuk memperluas kemampuan Claude di Claude Code.
- [Perintah slash](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/slash-commands.md): Kontrol perilaku Claude selama sesi interaktif dengan perintah slash.
- [Konfigurasi baris status](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/statusline.md): Buat baris status kustom untuk Claude Code untuk menampilkan informasi kontekstual
- [Subagen](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/sub-agents.md): Buat dan gunakan subagen AI khusus dalam Claude Code untuk alur kerja spesifik tugas dan manajemen konteks yang lebih baik.
- [Optimalkan pengaturan terminal Anda](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/terminal-config.md): Claude Code bekerja paling baik ketika terminal Anda dikonfigurasi dengan benar. Ikuti panduan ini untuk mengoptimalkan pengalaman Anda.
- [Ikhtisar deployment enterprise](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/third-party-integrations.md): Pelajari bagaimana Claude Code dapat terintegrasi dengan berbagai layanan pihak ketiga dan infrastruktur untuk memenuhi persyaratan deployment enterprise.
- [Pemecahan Masalah](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/troubleshooting.md): Temukan solusi untuk masalah umum dengan instalasi dan penggunaan Claude Code.
- [Visual Studio Code](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/claude-code/vs-code.md): Gunakan Claude Code dengan Visual Studio Code melalui ekstensi native kami atau integrasi CLI
- [Memulai dengan Claude](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/get-started.md): Buat panggilan API pertama Anda ke Claude dan bangun asisten pencarian web sederhana
- [Pengantar Claude](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/intro.md): Claude adalah platform AI yang sangat berkinerja tinggi, terpercaya, dan cerdas yang dibangun oleh Anthropic. Claude unggul dalam tugas-tugas yang melibatkan bahasa, penalaran, analisis, coding, dan lainnya.
- [Membangun dengan Claude](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/overview.md): Claude adalah keluarga [model AI yang sangat berkinerja tinggi dan cerdas](/id/docs/about-claude/models) yang dibangun oleh Anthropic. Meskipun Claude kuat dan dapat diperluas, ia juga merupakan AI yang paling dapat dipercaya dan andal yang tersedia. Ia mengikuti protokol kritis, membuat lebih sedikit kesalahan, dan tahan terhadap jailbreak—memungkinkan [pelanggan enterprise](https://claude.com/customers) untuk membangun aplikasi bertenaga AI yang paling aman dalam skala besar.
- [Tentukan kriteria keberhasilan Anda](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/test-and-evaluate/define-success.md)
- [Buat evaluasi empiris yang kuat](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/test-and-evaluate/develop-tests.md): Pelajari cara mengembangkan kasus uji yang efektif untuk mengukur kinerja LLM terhadap kriteria kesuksesan Anda.
- [Menggunakan Alat Evaluasi](https://docs.claude.com/id/docs/test-and-evaluate/eval-tool.md): [Claude Console](https://console.anthropic.com/dashboard) menampilkan **alat Evaluasi** yang memungkinkan Anda menguji prompt Anda dalam berbagai skenario.

- [Kartu model Claude 3](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/claude-3-model-card.md)
- [Kartu Sistem Claude 4](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/claude-4-system-card.md): Kartu model Anthropic untuk Claude Opus dan Sonnet 4 dengan detail performa dan keamanan.
- [Anthropic Courses](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/courses.md)
- [null](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/overview.md)
- [Editor adaptif](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/adaptive-editor.md): Tulis ulang teks mengikuti instruksi yang diberikan pengguna, seperti dengan nada, audiens, atau gaya yang berbeda.
- [Analis kode bandara](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/airport-code-analyst.md): Temukan dan ekstrak kode bandara dari teks.
- [Antropolog alien](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/alien-anthropologist.md): Analisis budaya dan adat istiadat manusia dari perspektif seorang antropolog alien.
- [Alkemis aliterasi](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/alliteration-alchemist.md): Menghasilkan frasa dan kalimat aliteratif untuk subjek yang diberikan.
- [Siaran Babel](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/babels-broadcasts.md): Buat tweet pengumuman produk yang menarik dalam 10 bahasa yang paling banyak digunakan di dunia.
- [Pembangun merek](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/brand-builder.md): Buat brief desain untuk identitas merek yang holistik.
- [Pelatih karir](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/career-coach.md): Terlibat dalam percakapan bermain peran dengan pelatih karir AI.
- [Kutip sumber Anda](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/cite-your-sources.md): Dapatkan jawaban atas pertanyaan tentang konten dokumen dengan kutipan relevan yang mendukung respons.
- [Penjelas kode](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/code-clarifier.md): Sederhanakan dan jelaskan kode kompleks dalam bahasa yang mudah dipahami.
- [Konsultan kode](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/code-consultant.md): Sarankan perbaikan untuk mengoptimalkan performa kode Python.
- [Peramal korporat](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/corporate-clairvoyant.md): Ekstrak wawasan, identifikasi risiko, dan suling informasi kunci dari laporan korporat yang panjang menjadi satu memo.
- [Cosmic Keystrokes](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/cosmic-keystrokes.md): Menghasilkan permainan mengetik kecepatan interaktif dalam satu file HTML, menampilkan gameplay side-scrolling dan styling Tailwind CSS.
- [Konverter CSV](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/csv-converter.md): Konversi data dari berbagai format (JSON, XML, dll.) menjadi file CSV yang diformat dengan benar.
- [Pencipta kuliner](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/culinary-creator.md): Sarankan ide resep berdasarkan bahan-bahan yang tersedia dan preferensi diet pengguna.
- [Pengorganisir data](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/data-organizer.md): Ubah teks tidak terstruktur menjadi tabel JSON yang disesuaikan.
- [Dekoder arah](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/direction-decoder.md): Mengubah bahasa alami menjadi petunjuk langkah demi langkah.
- [Penafsir mimpi](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/dream-interpreter.md): Menawarkan interpretasi dan wawasan tentang simbolisme mimpi pengguna.
- [Estimator efisiensi](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/efficiency-estimator.md): Hitung kompleksitas waktu dari fungsi dan algoritma.
- [Ekstraksi email](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/email-extractor.md): Ekstrak alamat email dari dokumen ke dalam daftar berformat JSON.
- [Encoder emoji](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/emoji-encoder.md): Mengubah teks biasa menjadi pesan emoji yang menyenangkan dan ekspresif.
- [Navigator dilema etis](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/ethical-dilemma-navigator.md): Membantu pengguna memikirkan dilema etis yang kompleks dan memberikan perspektif yang berbeda.
- [Ahli formula Excel](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/excel-formula-expert.md): Membuat formula Excel berdasarkan perhitungan atau manipulasi data yang dijelaskan pengguna.
- [Pembuat fungsi](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/function-fabricator.md): Membuat fungsi Python berdasarkan spesifikasi yang detail.
- [Penasihat mode futuristik](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/futuristic-fashion-advisor.md): Sarankan tren dan gaya mode avant-garde untuk preferensi spesifik pengguna.
- [Git gud](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/git-gud.md): Menghasilkan perintah Git yang sesuai berdasarkan tindakan kontrol versi yang dijelaskan pengguna.
- [Pembuat skrip Google apps](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/google-apps-scripter.md): Menghasilkan skrip Google Apps untuk menyelesaikan tugas berdasarkan kebutuhan pengguna.
- [Guru penilaian](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/grading-guru.md): Membandingkan dan mengevaluasi kualitas teks tertulis berdasarkan kriteria dan standar yang ditentukan pengguna.
- [Grammar genie](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/grammar-genie.md): Mengubah kalimat yang salah secara tata bahasa menjadi bahasa Inggris yang benar.
- [Hal si pembantu humoris](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/hal-the-humorous-helper.md): Mengobrol dengan AI berpengetahuan luas yang memiliki sisi sarkastik.
- [Penjelas idiom](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/idiom-illuminator.md): Menjelaskan makna dan asal-usul idiom dan peribahasa yang umum.
- [Pembuat pertanyaan wawancara](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/interview-question-crafter.md): Menghasilkan pertanyaan untuk wawancara.
- [Legenda LaTeX](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/latex-legend.md): Tulis dokumen LaTeX, menghasilkan kode untuk persamaan matematika, tabel, dan lainnya.
- [Perencana pelajaran](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/lesson-planner.md): Buat rencana pelajaran mendalam tentang subjek apa pun.
- [Perpustakaan Prompt](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/library.md)
- [Moderator utama](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/master-moderator.md): Evaluasi input pengguna untuk konten yang berpotensi berbahaya atau ilegal.
- [Penulis notulen rapat](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/meeting-scribe.md): Merangkum rapat menjadi ringkasan yang ringkas termasuk topik diskusi, poin-poin penting, dan item tindakan.
- [Memo maestro](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/memo-maestro.md): Menyusun memo perusahaan yang komprehensif berdasarkan poin-poin kunci.
- [Mentor mindfulness](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/mindfulness-mentor.md): Membimbing pengguna melalui latihan mindfulness dan teknik untuk mengurangi stres.
- [Pewarna suasana hati](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/mood-colorizer.md): Mengubah deskripsi teks suasana hati menjadi kode HEX yang sesuai.
- [Musa motivasional](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/motivational-muse.md): Berikan pesan motivasi dan afirmasi yang dipersonalisasi berdasarkan input pengguna.
- [Pencipta neologisme](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/neologism-creator.md): Menciptakan kata-kata baru dan memberikan definisinya berdasarkan konsep atau ide yang diberikan pengguna.
- [Pemikir perspektif](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/perspectives-ponderer.md): Menimbang pro dan kontra dari topik yang diberikan pengguna.
- [Renungan filosofis](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/philosophical-musings.md): Terlibat dalam diskusi filosofis mendalam dan eksperimen pemikiran.
- [Pembersih PII](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/pii-purifier.md): Secara otomatis mendeteksi dan menghapus informasi yang dapat mengidentifikasi pribadi (PII) dari dokumen teks.
- [Kekuatan super poliglot](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/polyglot-superpowers.md): Terjemahkan teks dari bahasa apa pun ke bahasa apa pun.
- [Penyair portmanteau](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/portmanteau-poet.md): Gabungkan dua kata bersama-sama untuk menciptakan portmanteau baru yang bermakna.
- [Ahli penamaan produk](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/product-naming-pro.md): Buat nama produk yang menarik dari deskripsi dan kata kunci.
- [Penyempurna prosa](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/prose-polisher.md): Perbaiki dan tingkatkan konten tertulis dengan teknik copyediting lanjutan dan saran.
- [Pun-dit](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/pun-dit.md): Menghasilkan permainan kata yang cerdas dan permainan bahasa berdasarkan topik yang diberikan.
- [Pemburu bug Python](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/python-bug-buster.md): Mendeteksi dan memperbaiki bug dalam kode Python.
- [Pengklasifikasi ulasan](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/review-classifier.md): Kategorikan umpan balik ke dalam tag dan kategorisasi yang telah ditentukan sebelumnya.
- [Teka-teki untukku](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/riddle-me-this.md): Buat teka-teki dan pandu pengguna menuju solusinya.
- [Simulator skenario sci-fi](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/sci-fi-scenario-simulator.md): Diskusikan dengan pengguna berbagai skenario fiksi ilmiah dan tantangan serta pertimbangan yang terkait.
- [Penyederhanaan untuk kelas dua](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/second-grade-simplifier.md): Membuat teks kompleks mudah dipahami oleh pelajar muda.
- [Ahli perumpamaan](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/simile-savant.md): Menghasilkan perumpamaan dari deskripsi dasar.
- [Bijak Socrates](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/socratic-sage.md): Terlibat dalam percakapan gaya Socrates mengenai topik yang diberikan pengguna.
- [Penyihir spreadsheet](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/spreadsheet-sorcerer.md): Menghasilkan spreadsheet CSV dengan berbagai jenis data.
- [Penyihir SQL](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/sql-sorcerer.md): Mengubah bahasa sehari-hari menjadi query SQL.
- [Pendamping bercerita](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/storytelling-sidekick.md): Berkolaborasi menciptakan cerita yang menarik dengan pengguna, menawarkan plot twist dan pengembangan karakter.
- [Konsultan perjalanan waktu](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/time-travel-consultant.md): Membantu pengguna menavigasi skenario perjalanan waktu hipotetis dan implikasinya.
- [Tongue twister](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/tongue-twister.md): Buat tongue twister yang menantang.
- [Generator trivia](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/trivia-generator.md): Buat pertanyaan trivia tentang berbagai topik dan berikan petunjuk saat diperlukan.
- [Detektor nada tweet](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/tweet-tone-detector.md): Deteksi nada dan sentimen di balik tweet.
- [Inovator kebugaran VR](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/vr-fitness-innovator.md): Brainstorm ide-ide kreatif untuk permainan kebugaran realitas virtual.
- [Wizard website](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/prompt-library/website-wizard.md): Membuat website satu halaman berdasarkan spesifikasi pengguna.
- [Quickstarts](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/quickstarts.md): Mulai dengan cepat menggunakan Claude dan Claude API
- [Status sistem](https://docs.claude.com/id/resources/status.md): Status sistem

Enables organizations to analyze developer productivity and build custom dashboards.

- [Tracciamento di Costi e Utilizzo](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/agent-sdk/cost-tracking.md): Comprendi e traccia l'utilizzo dei token per la fatturazione nel Claude Agent SDK
- [Strumenti Personalizzati](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/agent-sdk/custom-tools.md): Costruisci e integra strumenti personalizzati per estendere le funzionalità di Claude Agent SDK
- [Hosting dell'Agent SDK](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/agent-sdk/hosting.md): Distribuisci e ospita Claude Agent SDK in ambienti di produzione
- [MCP nell'SDK](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/agent-sdk/mcp.md): Estendi Claude Code con strumenti personalizzati utilizzando i server del Model Context Protocol
- [Modifica dei prompt di sistema](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/agent-sdk/modifying-system-prompts.md): Impara come personalizzare il comportamento di Claude modificando i prompt di sistema utilizzando tre approcci - stili di output, systemPrompt con append e prompt di sistema personalizzati.
- [Panoramica dell'SDK Agent](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/agent-sdk/overview.md): Costruisci agenti AI personalizzati con l'SDK Agent di Claude
- [Gestione dei Permessi](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/agent-sdk/permissions.md): Controlla l'uso degli strumenti e i permessi nel Claude Agent SDK
- [Riferimento Agent SDK - Python](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/agent-sdk/python.md): Riferimento API completo per l'Agent SDK Python, incluse tutte le funzioni, tipi e classi.
- [Gestione delle Sessioni](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/agent-sdk/sessions.md): Comprendere come il Claude Agent SDK gestisce le sessioni e la ripresa delle sessioni
- [Comandi Slash nell'SDK](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/agent-sdk/slash-commands.md): Impara come utilizzare i comandi slash per controllare le sessioni di Claude Code attraverso l'SDK
- [Input in Streaming](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/agent-sdk/streaming-vs-single-mode.md): Comprendere le due modalità di input per Claude Agent SDK e quando utilizzare ciascuna
- [Subagenti nell'SDK](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/agent-sdk/subagents.md): Lavorare con i subagenti nel Claude Agent SDK
- [Liste Todo](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/agent-sdk/todo-tracking.md): Traccia e visualizza i todo utilizzando il Claude Agent SDK per una gestione organizzata delle attività
- [Riferimento SDK Agent - TypeScript](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/agent-sdk/typescript.md): Riferimento API completo per l'SDK Agent TypeScript, incluse tutte le funzioni, tipi e interfacce.
- [Header beta](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/beta-headers.md): Documentazione per l'utilizzo degli header beta con l'API Claude
- [Annulla un Batch di Messaggi](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/canceling-message-batches.md): Batches may be canceled any time before processing ends. Once cancellation is initiated, the batch enters a `canceling` state, at which time the system may complete any in-progress, non-interruptible requests before finalizing cancellation.

The number of canceled requests is specified in `request_counts`. To determine which requests were canceled, check the individual results within the batch. Note that cancellation may not result in any canceled requests if they were non-interruptible.

Learn more about the Message Batches API in our [user guide](/en/docs/build-with-claude/batch-processing)
- [API di Analisi del Codice Claude](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/claude-code-analytics-api.md): Accedi programmaticamente alle analisi di utilizzo di Claude Code della tua organizzazione e alle metriche di produttività con l'API Admin di Analisi del Codice Claude.
- [API Amazon Bedrock](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/claude-on-amazon-bedrock.md): I modelli Claude di Anthropic sono ora generalmente disponibili tramite Amazon Bedrock.
- [API Vertex AI](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/claude-on-vertex-ai.md): I modelli Claude di Anthropic sono ora generalmente disponibili tramite [Vertex AI](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai).
- [SDK Client](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/client-sdks.md): Forniamo librerie client in diversi linguaggi popolari che rendono più facile lavorare con l'API Claude.
- [Crea un Batch di Messaggi](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/creating-message-batches.md): Send a batch of Message creation requests.

The Message Batches API can be used to process multiple Messages API requests at once. Once a Message Batch is created, it begins processing immediately. Batches can take up to 24 hours to complete.

Learn more about the Message Batches API in our [user guide](/en/docs/build-with-claude/batch-processing)
- [Elimina un Batch di Messaggi](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/deleting-message-batches.md): Delete a Message Batch.

Message Batches can only be deleted once they've finished processing. If you'd like to delete an in-progress batch, you must first cancel it.

Learn more about the Message Batches API in our [user guide](/en/docs/build-with-claude/batch-processing)
- [Errori](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/errors.md)
- [Scarica un File](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/files-content.md): Scarica i contenuti di un file generato da Claude
- [Crea un File](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/files-create.md): Carica un file
- [Elimina un File](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/files-delete.md): Rendi un file inaccessibile tramite l'API
- [Elenca File](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/files-list.md): Elenca i file all'interno di uno spazio di lavoro
- [Ottieni Metadati del File](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/files-metadata.md)
- [Ottenere aiuto](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/getting-help.md): Abbiamo cercato di fornire le risposte alle domande più comuni in questa documentazione. Tuttavia, se hai bisogno di ulteriore supporto tecnico per utilizzare Claude, l'API di Claude o qualsiasi dei nostri prodotti, puoi contattare il nostro team di supporto su [support.claude.com](https://support.claude.com).
- [Gestione dei motivi di arresto](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/handling-stop-reasons.md): Comprendi i valori di stop_reason nell'API Messages di Claude e come gestire diversi tipi di risposta in modo appropriato.
- [Indirizzi IP](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/ip-addresses.md): I servizi Anthropic utilizzano indirizzi IP fissi sia per le connessioni in entrata che in uscita. Puoi utilizzare questi indirizzi per configurare le regole del firewall per un accesso sicuro all'API Claude e alla Console. Questi indirizzi non cambieranno senza preavviso.
- [Elenca Batch di Messaggi](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/listing-message-batches.md): List all Message Batches within a Workspace. Most recently created batches are returned first.

Learn more about the Message Batches API in our [user guide](/en/docs/build-with-claude/batch-processing)
- [Messaggi](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/messages.md): Send a structured list of input messages with text and/or image content, and the model will generate the next message in the conversation.

The Messages API can be used for either single queries or stateless multi-turn conversations.

Learn more about the Messages API in our [user guide](/en/docs/initial-setup)
- [Esempi di Message Batches](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/messages-batch-examples.md): Esempi di utilizzo per l'API Message Batches
- [Conta token messaggio](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/messages-count-tokens.md): Count the number of tokens in a Message.

The Token Count API can be used to count the number of tokens in a Message, including tools, images, and documents, without creating it.

Learn more about token counting in our [user guide](/en/docs/build-with-claude/token-counting)
- [Esempi di messaggi](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/messages-examples.md): Esempi di richiesta e risposta per l'API Messages
- [Migrazione da Text Completions](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/migrating-from-text-completions-to-messages.md): Migrazione da Text Completions a Messages
- [Ottieni un Modello](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/models.md): Get a specific model.

The Models API response can be used to determine information about a specific model or resolve a model alias to a model ID.
- [Elenca Modelli](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/models-list.md): List available models.

The Models API response can be used to determine which models are available for use in the API. More recently released models are listed first.
- [Compatibilità SDK OpenAI](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/openai-sdk.md): Anthropic fornisce un livello di compatibilità che ti consente di utilizzare l'SDK OpenAI per testare l'API Claude. Con poche modifiche al codice, puoi valutare rapidamente le capacità del modello Anthropic.
- [Panoramica](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/overview.md): Panoramica dell'API Claude
- [Genera un prompt](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/prompt-tools-generate.md): Genera un prompt ben scritto
- [Migliorare un prompt](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/prompt-tools-improve.md): Creare un prompt nuovo e migliorato guidato dal feedback
- [Templatizzare un prompt](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/prompt-tools-templatize.md): Templatizzare un prompt identificando ed estraendo le variabili
- [Limiti di velocità](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/rate-limits.md): Per mitigare l'uso improprio e gestire la capacità sulla nostra API, abbiamo implementato limiti su quanto un'organizzazione può utilizzare l'API Claude.
- [Recupera Risultati Batch Messaggi](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/retrieving-message-batch-results.md): Streams the results of a Message Batch as a `.jsonl` file.

Each line in the file is a JSON object containing the result of a single request in the Message Batch. Results are not guaranteed to be in the same order as requests. Use the `custom_id` field to match results to requests.

Learn more about the Message Batches API in our [user guide](/en/docs/build-with-claude/batch-processing)
- [Recupera un Batch di Messaggi](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/retrieving-message-batches.md): This endpoint is idempotent and can be used to poll for Message Batch completion. To access the results of a Message Batch, make a request to the `results_url` field in the response.

Learn more about the Message Batches API in our [user guide](/en/docs/build-with-claude/batch-processing)
- [Livelli di servizio](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/service-tiers.md): Diversi livelli di servizio ti permettono di bilanciare disponibilità, prestazioni e costi prevedibili in base alle esigenze della tua applicazione.
- [Utilizzo di Agent Skills con l'API](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/skills-guide.md): Scopri come utilizzare Agent Skills per estendere le capacità di Claude tramite l'API.
- [Regioni supportate](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/supported-regions.md): Ecco i paesi, le regioni e i territori da cui attualmente possiamo supportare l'accesso:
- [API di Utilizzo e Costi](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/usage-cost-api.md): Accedi programmaticamente ai dati di utilizzo e costi API della tua organizzazione con l'API Admin di Utilizzo e Costi.
- [Versioni](https://docs.claude.com/it/api/versioning.md): Quando effettui richieste API, devi inviare un header di richiesta `anthropic-version`. Ad esempio, `anthropic-version: 2023-06-01`. Se stai utilizzando i nostri [SDK client](/it/api/client-sdks), questo viene gestito automaticamente per te.
- [Glossario](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/about-claude/glossary.md): Questi concetti non sono unici ai modelli linguistici di Anthropic, ma presentiamo di seguito un breve riassunto dei termini chiave.
- [Deprecazioni dei modelli](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/about-claude/model-deprecations.md): Informazioni sui modelli deprecati di Anthropic e sui loro sostituti raccomandati.
- [Scegliere il modello giusto](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/about-claude/models/choosing-a-model.md): Selezionare il modello Claude ottimale per la tua applicazione comporta bilanciare tre considerazioni chiave: capacità, velocità e costo. Questa guida ti aiuta a prendere una decisione informata basata sui tuoi requisiti specifici.
- [Migrazione a Claude 4.5](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/about-claude/models/migrating-to-claude-4.md): Guida completa per migrare da Claude Sonnet 3.7 a Claude Sonnet 4.5 e da Claude Haiku 3.5 a Claude Haiku 4.5, inclusi i cambiamenti che interrompono la compatibilità e le istruzioni passo dopo passo.
- [Panoramica dei modelli](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/about-claude/models/overview.md): Claude è una famiglia di modelli linguistici di grandi dimensioni all'avanguardia sviluppati da Anthropic. Questa guida introduce i nostri modelli e confronta le loro prestazioni.
- [Novità in Claude 4.5](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/about-claude/models/whats-new-claude-4-5.md)
- [Prezzi](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/about-claude/pricing.md): Scopri la struttura dei prezzi di Anthropic per modelli e funzionalità
- [Moderazione dei contenuti](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/about-claude/use-case-guides/content-moderation.md): La moderazione dei contenuti è un aspetto critico per mantenere un ambiente sicuro, rispettoso e produttivo nelle applicazioni digitali. In questa guida, discuteremo come Claude può essere utilizzato per moderare i contenuti all'interno della tua applicazione digitale.
- [Agente di supporto clienti](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/about-claude/use-case-guides/customer-support-chat.md): Questa guida illustra come sfruttare le capacità conversazionali avanzate di Claude per gestire le richieste dei clienti in tempo reale, fornendo supporto 24/7, riducendo i tempi di attesa e gestendo volumi elevati di supporto con risposte accurate e interazioni positive.
- [Riassunto legale](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/about-claude/use-case-guides/legal-summarization.md): Questa guida illustra come sfruttare le capacità avanzate di elaborazione del linguaggio naturale di Claude per riassumere efficacemente documenti legali, estraendo informazioni chiave e accelerando la ricerca legale. Con Claude, puoi semplificare la revisione di contratti, la preparazione di contenziosi e il lavoro normativo, risparmiando tempo e garantendo precisione nei tuoi processi legali.
- [Guide per i casi d'uso comuni](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/about-claude/use-case-guides/overview.md)
- [Instradamento dei ticket](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/about-claude/use-case-guides/ticket-routing.md): Questa guida illustra come sfruttare le capacità avanzate di comprensione del linguaggio naturale di Claude per classificare i ticket di supporto clienti su larga scala basandosi sull'intento del cliente, urgenza, prioritizzazione, profilo del cliente e altro ancora.
- [Componente aggiuntivo di Google Sheets](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/agents-and-tools/claude-for-sheets.md): L'[estensione Claude for Sheets](https://workspace.google.com/marketplace/app/claude%5Ffor%5Fsheets/909417792257) integra Claude in Google Sheets, permettendoti di eseguire interazioni con Claude direttamente nelle celle.
- [Connettore MCP](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/agents-and-tools/mcp-connector.md): Il connettore Model Context Protocol (MCP) di Claude ti consente di connetterti a server MCP remoti direttamente dall'API Messages senza un client MCP separato.
- [Server MCP remoti](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/agents-and-tools/remote-mcp-servers.md): Server MCP remoti disponibili per sviluppatori
- [Strumento bash](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/bash-tool.md): Lo strumento bash consente a Claude di eseguire comandi shell in una sessione bash persistente, permettendo operazioni di sistema, esecuzione di script e automazione da riga di comando.
- [Strumento di esecuzione codice](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/code-execution-tool.md)
- [Strumento di utilizzo del computer](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/computer-use-tool.md): Claude può interagire con ambienti informatici attraverso lo strumento di utilizzo del computer, che fornisce capacità di screenshot e controllo di mouse/tastiera per l'interazione autonoma del desktop.
- [Streaming granulare degli strumenti](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/fine-grained-tool-streaming.md): Scopri come utilizzare lo streaming granulare per i parametri degli strumenti per ridurre la latenza e iniziare a ricevere parametri di grandi dimensioni più velocemente.
- [Come implementare l'uso degli strumenti](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/implement-tool-use.md): Guida completa per implementare l'uso degli strumenti con Claude, incluse definizioni degli strumenti, controllo dell'output e gestione degli errori.
- [Strumento memoria](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/memory-tool.md): Lo strumento memoria consente a Claude di memorizzare e recuperare informazioni attraverso le conversazioni tramite una directory di file di memoria.
- [Uso degli strumenti con Claude](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/overview.md)
- [Strumento editor di testo](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/text-editor-tool.md): Claude può utilizzare uno strumento editor di testo definito da Anthropic per visualizzare e modificare file di testo, aiutandoti a debuggare, correggere e migliorare il tuo codice o altri documenti di testo.
- [Uso efficiente dei token per gli strumenti](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/token-efficient-tool-use.md): Scopri come utilizzare gli strumenti in modo efficiente con i token in Claude, riducendo i costi e migliorando le prestazioni.
- [Strumento web fetch](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/web-fetch-tool.md): Lo strumento web fetch consente a Claude di recuperare contenuti completi da pagine web e documenti PDF specificati.
- [Strumento di ricerca web](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/agents-and-tools/tool-use/web-search-tool.md): Lo strumento di ricerca web dà a Claude accesso diretto ai contenuti web in tempo reale, permettendogli di rispondere alle domande con informazioni aggiornate oltre il suo limite di conoscenza.
- [Elaborazione batch](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/build-with-claude/batch-processing.md)
- [Citazioni](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/build-with-claude/citations.md): Claude è in grado di fornire citazioni dettagliate quando risponde a domande sui documenti, aiutandoti a tracciare e verificare le fonti di informazione nelle risposte.
- [Modifica del contesto](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/build-with-claude/context-editing.md): Gestisci automaticamente il contesto della conversazione man mano che cresce con la modifica del contesto.
- [Finestre di contesto](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/build-with-claude/context-windows.md): Comprendi come funzionano le finestre di contesto di Claude, incluso il pensiero esteso, l'uso di strumenti e la gestione dei token.
- [Embeddings](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/build-with-claude/embeddings.md): Gli embeddings di testo sono rappresentazioni numeriche del testo che consentono di misurare la similarità semantica. Questa guida introduce gli embeddings, le loro applicazioni e come utilizzare i modelli di embedding per compiti come ricerca, raccomandazioni e rilevamento di anomalie.

- [Supporto multilingue](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/build-with-claude/multilingual-support.md): Claude eccelle in compiti in più lingue, mantenendo prestazioni cross-linguistiche elevate rispetto all'inglese.

- [Supporto PDF](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/build-with-claude/pdf-support.md): Elabora PDF con Claude. Estrai testo, analizza grafici e comprendi contenuti visivi dai tuoi documenti.

- [Introduzione a Claude](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/intro.md): Claude è una piattaforma AI altamente performante, affidabile e intelligente costruita da Anthropic. Claude eccelle in compiti che coinvolgono linguaggio, ragionamento, analisi, programmazione e altro ancora.
- [Costruire con Claude](https://docs.claude.com/it/docs/overview.md): Claude è una famiglia di [modelli AI altamente performanti e intelligenti](/it/docs/about-claude/models) costruiti da Anthropic. Sebbene Claude sia potente ed estensibile, è anche l'AI più affidabile e sicura disponibile. Segue protocolli critici, commette meno errori ed è resistente ai jailbreak—consentendo ai [clienti enterprise](https://claude.com/customers) di costruire le applicazioni AI più sicure su larga scala.

- [Editor adattivo](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/adaptive-editor.md): Riscrivi il testo seguendo le istruzioni fornite dall'utente, come con un tono, pubblico o stile diverso.
- [Analizzatore di codici aeroportuali](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/airport-code-analyst.md): Trova ed estrai codici aeroportuali dal testo.
- [Antropologo alieno](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/alien-anthropologist.md): Analizza la cultura e le usanze umane dalla prospettiva di un antropologo alieno.
- [Alchimista dell'allitterazione](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/alliteration-alchemist.md): Genera frasi e periodi allitterativi per qualsiasi argomento dato.
- [Le trasmissioni di Babel](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/babels-broadcasts.md): Crea tweet di annuncio prodotto coinvolgenti nelle 10 lingue più parlate al mondo.
- [Costruttore di brand](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/brand-builder.md): Crea un brief di design per un'identità di marca olistica.
- [Coach di carriera](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/career-coach.md): Partecipa a conversazioni di gioco di ruolo con un coach di carriera AI.
- [Cita le tue fonti](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/cite-your-sources.md): Ottieni risposte a domande sul contenuto di un documento con citazioni pertinenti che supportano la risposta.
- [Chiarificatore di codice](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/code-clarifier.md): Semplifica e spiega codice complesso in linguaggio semplice.
- [Consulente di codice](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/code-consultant.md): Suggerisci miglioramenti per ottimizzare le prestazioni del codice Python.
- [Chiaroveggente aziendale](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/corporate-clairvoyant.md): Estrai intuizioni, identifica rischi e distilla informazioni chiave da lunghi report aziendali in un singolo memo.
- [Cosmic Keystrokes](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/cosmic-keystrokes.md): Genera un gioco interattivo di digitazione veloce in un singolo file HTML, con gameplay a scorrimento laterale e stile Tailwind CSS.
- [Convertitore CSV](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/csv-converter.md): Converti dati da vari formati (JSON, XML, ecc.) in file CSV formattati correttamente.
- [Creatore culinario](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/culinary-creator.md): Suggerisci idee per ricette basate sugli ingredienti disponibili dell'utente e le preferenze dietetiche.
- [Organizzatore di dati](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/data-organizer.md): Trasforma testo non strutturato in tabelle JSON personalizzate.
- [Decodificatore di direzioni](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/direction-decoder.md): Trasforma il linguaggio naturale in istruzioni passo dopo passo.
- [Interprete dei sogni](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/dream-interpreter.md): Offri interpretazioni e intuizioni sul simbolismo dei sogni dell'utente.
- [Stimatore di efficienza](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/efficiency-estimator.md): Calcola la complessità temporale di funzioni e algoritmi.
- [Estrattore di email](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/email-extractor.md): Estrai indirizzi email da un documento in un elenco formattato JSON.
- [Codificatore emoji](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/emoji-encoder.md): Converti testo semplice in messaggi emoji divertenti ed espressivi.
- [Navigatore di dilemmi etici](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/ethical-dilemma-navigator.md): Aiuta l'utente a riflettere su dilemmi etici complessi e fornisce diverse prospettive.
- [Esperto di formule Excel](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/excel-formula-expert.md): Crea formule Excel basate su calcoli o manipolazioni di dati descritti dall'utente.
- [Fabbricatore di funzioni](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/function-fabricator.md): Crea funzioni Python basate su specifiche dettagliate.
- [Consulente di moda futuristica](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/futuristic-fashion-advisor.md): Suggerisci tendenze e stili di moda d'avanguardia per le preferenze specifiche dell'utente.
- [Git gud](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/git-gud.md): Genera comandi Git appropriati basati sulle azioni di controllo versione descritte dall'utente.
- [Scrittore di script Google Apps](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/google-apps-scripter.md): Genera script Google Apps per completare attività basate sui requisiti dell'utente.
- [Guru della valutazione](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/grading-guru.md): Confronta e valuta la qualità di testi scritti basandosi su criteri e standard definiti dall'utente.
- [Genio della grammatica](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/grammar-genie.md): Trasforma frasi grammaticalmente scorrette in inglese corretto.
- [Hal l'assistente umoristico](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/hal-the-humorous-helper.md): Chatta con un'IA esperta che ha un lato sarcastico.
- [Illuminatore di modi di dire](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/idiom-illuminator.md): Spiega il significato e l'origine di modi di dire e proverbi comuni.
- [Creatore di domande per colloqui](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/interview-question-crafter.md): Genera domande per colloqui.
- [Leggenda LaTeX](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/latex-legend.md): Scrivi documenti LaTeX, generando codice per equazioni matematiche, tabelle e altro ancora.
- [Pianificatore di lezioni](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/lesson-planner.md): Crea piani di lezione approfonditi su qualsiasi argomento.
- [Libreria di Prompt](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/library.md)
- [Moderatore esperto](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/master-moderator.md): Valuta gli input degli utenti per potenziali contenuti dannosi o illegali.
- [Segretario di riunioni](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/meeting-scribe.md): Distilla le riunioni in riassunti concisi che includono argomenti di discussione, punti chiave e azioni da intraprendere.
- [Memo maestro](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/memo-maestro.md): Componi memo aziendali completi basati su punti chiave.
- [Mentore di mindfulness](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/mindfulness-mentor.md): Guida l'utente attraverso esercizi e tecniche di mindfulness per la riduzione dello stress.
- [Colorizzatore di stati d'animo](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/mood-colorizer.md): Trasforma le descrizioni testuali degli stati d'animo in codici HEX corrispondenti.
- [Musa motivazionale](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/motivational-muse.md): Fornisci messaggi motivazionali personalizzati e affermazioni positive in base all'input dell'utente.
- [Creatore di neologismi](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/neologism-creator.md): Inventa nuove parole e fornisce le loro definizioni basate su concetti o idee fornite dall'utente.
- [Ponderatore di prospettive](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/perspectives-ponderer.md): Valuta i pro e i contro di un argomento fornito dall'utente.
- [Riflessioni filosofiche](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/philosophical-musings.md): Partecipa a discussioni filosofiche profonde ed esperimenti mentali.
- [Purificatore di PII](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/pii-purifier.md): Rileva e rimuove automaticamente le informazioni di identificazione personale (PII) dai documenti di testo.
- [Superpoteri poliglotti](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/polyglot-superpowers.md): Traduci testo da qualsiasi lingua in qualsiasi lingua.
- [Poeta di parole macedonia](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/portmanteau-poet.md): Unisci due parole insieme per creare una nuova parola macedonia significativa.
- [Esperto di naming prodotti](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/product-naming-pro.md): Crea nomi accattivanti per prodotti da descrizioni e parole chiave.
- [Perfezionatore di prosa](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/prose-polisher.md): Rifinisci e migliora i contenuti scritti con tecniche avanzate di copyediting e suggerimenti.
- [Pun-dit](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/pun-dit.md): Genera giochi di parole intelligenti e battute basate su qualsiasi argomento dato.
- [Cacciatore di bug Python](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/python-bug-buster.md): Rileva e corregge bug nel codice Python.
- [Classificatore di recensioni](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/review-classifier.md): Categorizza i feedback in tag e categorizzazioni pre-specificati.
- [Indovinami questo](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/riddle-me-this.md): Genera indovinelli e guida l'utente verso le soluzioni.
- [Simulatore di scenari fantascientifici](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/sci-fi-scenario-simulator.md): Discuti con l'utente vari scenari di fantascienza e le sfide e considerazioni associate.
- [Semplificatore per seconda elementare](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/second-grade-simplifier.md): Rendi i testi complessi facili da capire per i giovani studenti.
- [Esperto di similitudini](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/simile-savant.md): Genera similitudini da descrizioni di base.
- [Saggio socratico](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/socratic-sage.md): Partecipa a una conversazione in stile socratico su un argomento fornito dall'utente.
- [Mago dei fogli di calcolo](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/spreadsheet-sorcerer.md): Genera fogli di calcolo CSV con vari tipi di dati.
- [Stregone SQL](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/sql-sorcerer.md): Trasforma il linguaggio quotidiano in query SQL.
- [Compagno di narrazione](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/storytelling-sidekick.md): Crea collaborativamente storie coinvolgenti con l'utente, offrendo colpi di scena e sviluppo dei personaggi.
- [Consulente di viaggi nel tempo](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/time-travel-consultant.md): Aiuta l'utente a navigare scenari ipotetici di viaggi nel tempo e le loro implicazioni.
- [Scioglilingua](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/tongue-twister.md): Crea scioglilingua impegnativi.
- [Generatore di trivia](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/trivia-generator.md): Genera domande di trivia su una vasta gamma di argomenti e fornisce suggerimenti quando necessario.
- [Rilevatore di tono dei tweet](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/tweet-tone-detector.md): Rileva il tono e il sentimento dietro i tweet.
- [Innovatore del fitness VR](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/vr-fitness-innovator.md): Genera idee creative per giochi di fitness in realtà virtuale.
- [Procedura guidata per siti web](https://docs.claude.com/it/resources/prompt-library/website-wizard.md): Crea siti web di una sola pagina basati sulle specifiche dell'utente.
